website_summaries.verdict: The mirror finish of the stand and bowl makes this a very elegant choice for the main bathroom. Good starter kit for beginning shavers, or those transitioning from electric shaving systems.
pros: Pieces have very attractive chrome finish
cons: Shave soap is basic – difficult to create lather

customer_reviews.title: From a noob
customer_reviews.text: Been looking for a safety razor to try to dive In to the world of shaving. A buddy suggested, and it came with all the parts packaged well, ten razors, and everything as expected. It was easy to use, made a good lather, and for a guy who watched a youtube video and shaved with it, I didnt even cut my face! Seriously, I love it, and this is my first safety razor ever.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Amazing set. I love this with a passion. Apart from being a great shaving kit, this decorates my bathroom very well. My father was impressed by it and said he wants a wet shaving set like this. It feels very sturdy and heavy, and gives off an expensive and classy feel. For the price, this can't be beat. If you're looking for a starter wet shave kit, this is the way to go. One thing though, the boar brush gives off this very odd and unpleasant smell when shaving. This is my first wet shave kit so I'm not sure if every boar brush gives off this smell. But that's not keeping me from loving it.
customer_reviews.author: Apolonio

customer_reviews.title: Great as a gift
customer_reviews.text: Gave to my husband as a gift, since he had been wanting a set like this. It didn't disappoint. The items are of good quality and he has enjoyed using the shaving set.
customer_reviews.author: Clare Romund

customer_reviews.title: Very nice quality matching set
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality matching set, every item is chromed. Badger hair brush is nice and soft on skin. Great kit for those of us who like the “old school” method of shaving. (Or are just sick of paying $4 or more for one 5 bladed shave head!)
customer_reviews.author: Arthur J Mendivil

customer_reviews.title: Missing items
customer_reviews.text: Received item and planned to give as a gift, when it was opened discovered the shaver and brush were missing, very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: soloTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Review
customer_reviews.text: This is a present. I received it opened; the box was ripped and banged up pretty bad. So, I opened it to be sure all parts present. They were but the razor was wrapped in a torn up piece of toilet paper..pretty poor presentation of the product (especially as a gift) and for the price. Hope the product is better.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Great starter set
customer_reviews.text: Great starter set. I think the razor and badger brush are excellent for the price point. The blade lasted about 5 shaves each. The soap that comes in the kit kind of sucks. It has no fragrance and very difficult to build a a generous lather. Otherwise, a great set to start and try out wet shaving.
customer_reviews.author: S. Arul

customer_reviews.title: Razor and cup are worth the rest is just add-ons
customer_reviews.text: The razor is amazing but the soap stinks and does not foam as well as others The brush works well
customer_reviews.author: timmythegeek

customer_reviews.title: Got this nice set for my father on his birthday
customer_reviews.text: Got this nice set for my father on his birthday. For the price of this the quality looks really good. It does not look cheap. My father really enjoyed his gift. I ended up buying extra blades for this set.
customer_reviews.author: ERIKA ARCINIEGA

customer_reviews.title: Gave as a gift
customer_reviews.text: recipient was stunned and thrilled. This is a complete kit and is very well made, worth the price
customer_reviews.author: Diana M. Duke

customer_reviews.title: Received used razor
customer_reviews.text: Received the shaving set today, opened and OMG the safety razor wrapped in bathtissue. Look like was used, I'm returning it.
customer_reviews.author: TW

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect set!! Bought one for my husband and another for my father in law. Comes with soap and a few razors. Very nice for price.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: Items made if good quality. The only issue I have is the brush smells like wet animal once used.
customer_reviews.author: Holly P

customer_reviews.title: Nice...maybe too nice!
customer_reviews.text: Nice set, father in law loved it, in fact he likes it so much that he won't use it because he does not want to mess it up. He keeps it as a display in the bathroom! Go figure lol
customer_reviews.author: Ron J.

customer_reviews.title: ... for my husband as some of the reviews were bad. The product is well made
customer_reviews.text: I was nervous buying this as a gift for my husband as some of the reviews were bad. The product is well made. All the pieces are individually packed in the box. He has not used it yet but everything looks nice.
customer_reviews.author: Sadian Ahmed

customer_reviews.title: Great for starters
customer_reviews.text: This kit is spectacular comes with everything you need to get started with wet shaving except for an aftershave but we can’t have it all.👍👌
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: Classyway to get a close shave
customer_reviews.text: I like the classy look of the silver collection, but the grip on the razor is kind of slippery when wet.
customer_reviews.author: Leann Ecker

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great but the bowl is too small. Looks very handsome on the counter though.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: This is a very nice set. The only reason I give it 4 ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice set. The only reason I give it 4 stars is because the brush smell funny.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is beautiful, and my husband loves shaving with it because ...
customer_reviews.text: It is beautiful, and my husband loves shaving with it because the razor doesn't get clogged up. He loves the brush, too!
customer_reviews.author: Gina Ratliff

customer_reviews.title: great starter set for DE razor shaving
customer_reviews.text: great starter set for DE razor shaving. The soap is okay performs as intended quickly replaced it with "Tranquil Sandalwood All Natural Artisan Shave Soap, 3 oz from Perfectly Natural Soap". I do like the the stainless steel stand and soap dish. Razors are not included with this kit. And the badger brush tends to smell like wet dog when not cleaned properly. but this has become my go to daily shaving kit.
customer_reviews.author: Nokturnaldj

customer_reviews.title: It fits my expectation. I was wondering to know ...
customer_reviews.text: It fits my expectation. I was wondering to know if I won't have bumps after shaving, but not all. And I guess the soap is very efficient to prevent the bumps.
customer_reviews.author: TITTI MOUSSI Christian

customer_reviews.title: Well done!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this set as a gift for my father who happens to be in an assisted care facility. He has a very nice young woman come several times a week to shave him and he wanted a razor set that adequately gets the job done. He really enjoys this product! He gets a nice close shave so when he has to skip a day, it is not a bother. Thank you for having a quality product that has allowed me to make my dad happy!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Bull

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: bowl grade Cplus, razor D-,Brush D plus, soap only a C, stand B plus
customer_reviews.author: Arthur M.

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality -- Love It !
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this set! I've been wanting to try wet shaving for quite awhile and finally decided to just go for it. I have to say as a beginner, I am not disappointed at all. The set is fine quality without a hint of plastic anywhere. The razor glides smoothly and easily over my skin and leaves me with the closest shave I've ever had. I've even dared to manscape with it and I have to say my boys are smooth as smooth as can be as well! If you are looking for a fine quality beginner's set, then you cannot go wrong with this item.
customer_reviews.author: Xander Devereaux

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Set to Start
customer_reviews.text: Razor & blades work well and look nice enough. Bowl fits soap and works as expected to lather. Brush is nothing special but gets the job done. For anyone looking to start using a safety razor and shaving soap this is a great starter pack before getting into more expensive and nicer tools. I may never replace the stand, bowl, or razor -- but the brush is definitely going to be replaced sooner than later. What you get for the price is pretty great and from what I saw there's not a better alternative available. Just don't expect it to wildly impress in quality.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor Elms

customer_reviews.title: Make someone happy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this shaving kit as a Father's Day gift. Upon opening it, everything was individually wrapped and packed carefully. All items had a very sharp chrome look to them. The razor, and brush fit perfectly into the stand. My father-n-law loves it and has said he had always wanted a good set like this one and now he has one.
customer_reviews.author: dnalley

customer_reviews.title: Every Man Needs This
customer_reviews.text: Third purchase from this brand. I have purchased a set for every man in my life. I can’t even begin to explain to you the amazing close shave these kind of razors give! You will not be disappointed. It helped clear my sons skin up - for regular store brand razors gave him acne.
customer_reviews.author: Bethana R.

customer_reviews.title: Great starter kit for double edge shaving
customer_reviews.text: Great starter kit for double edge shaving. Only four stars because the blades aren't very good, and the soap is difficult to lather up. I do love the scent of the soap, it's just not very user friendly. I bought the red Proraso Shaving Soap in a Bowl, and I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Captain Spaulding

customer_reviews.title: Good for beginners
customer_reviews.text: All of the pieces came as expected, but the packaging was a little haphazard. Everything is just kind of thrown in the box with packing peanuts around it. It felt like there could have been more care taken into account since I paid $50 for it. That being said, it is a very good kit for beginners, and I loved that it came with extra blades. I'm sure my boyfriend will love it :)
customer_reviews.author: Cecelia Sutton

customer_reviews.title: Nice set
customer_reviews.text: Received this item today. product looks quality built with a really nice finish. There is a ruberized pad that fits under the holder that is not glued in. Be careful, it falls out easily. I like this set and would recommend it, assuming that the brush holds up. We will see.
customer_reviews.author: Garold

customer_reviews.title: Ok but
customer_reviews.text: The pieces are nice however the soap bowl is a totally different color than the stand. It would be nice if all pieces matched to look more like a true set.
customer_reviews.author: jeff goforth

customer_reviews.title: Classy and functional
customer_reviews.text: Gave as a gift to LOML. Very nice presentation for the bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Great gift.
customer_reviews.text: I gave this as a gift to a young man who is just starting to shave regularly he's very happy with it he told me makes him feel grown up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very Nice set. Beautiful quality - first time I enjoyed shaving using this kit. My son is 16 and used this as his first shave and it was a pleasant experience. Would highly recommend. I have this about 6 months and it is in great shape.
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: The set is excellent and easy to keep clean
customer_reviews.text: The set is excellent and easy to keep clean. It is convenient to use and does a fine job of giving a smooth shave.
customer_reviews.author: George Webster, Ph.D.,

customer_reviews.title: Good investment
customer_reviews.text: It's worth owning, the quality and style are top notch and will PAY FOR ITSELF rather quickly with the cost difference of the razor blades cents vs dollars with a regular shaver
customer_reviews.author: FcJz

customer_reviews.title: Very nice shaving kit exactly what they said it would be and so much more
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband and he loves it would definitely buy again
customer_reviews.author: Chrissy

customer_reviews.title: Classy set
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband for Christmas and he loves it. It looks so classy in our master bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Mine did not have Brush OR Razor. I hope ...
customer_reviews.text: Mine did not have Brush OR Razor. I hope I can get this resolved quickly as it is a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: He didn't care for the scent of the soap but the packaging and quality of the set is nice.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my husband. He loves it! He didn't care for the scent of the soap but the packaging and quality of the set is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Waymire

customer_reviews.title: It provides a beautifully clean shave and is an AMAZING deal
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased as a gift and it went over VERY well. My boyfriend hasn't gone back to his cartridge razor since. It provides a beautifully clean shave and is an AMAZING deal, plus, the handle size and weight really worked well especially for someone transitioning out of cartridge razors. I searched for months trying to find the perfect kit for him, and this one was the one based on how tidy and complete it was. P.S. It's impossible to find a kit of this quality at this price. I'd definitely buy it again--best gift I've ever given to my boyfriend by far :)
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: Good gift great shave
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this razor. No razor burn he is happy with product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Shaving Set!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband. He loves it. It looks nice and works very well.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: old school is better, at 58 ive never spent much time shaveing
customer_reviews.text: old school is better, at 58 ive never spent much time shaveing, never paid much attention, I enjoy taking the time for a good shave, always use expensive quick shaves, time to save some money.
customer_reviews.author: davep

customer_reviews.title: ... some issues with billing but all straight and we love the set
customer_reviews.text: Had some issues with billing but all straight and we love the set.
customer_reviews.author: Lawanda Halfhill

customer_reviews.title: however I'm very disappointed as mine was incomplete
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a father's day gift. Kit seems OK compared to my Merkur one, however I'm very disappointed as mine was incomplete, it's missing the Badger Brush. I will returning this for a refund as there is no easy way to just get the brush as the complete kit has to be returned and then purchased again.
customer_reviews.author: C. Pavon

product_meta.title: GBS Premium Men's Wet Shaving Kit - Butterfly DE Safety Razor, Badger Bristles Brush, Chrome Shaving Soap Bowl, Shave Soap, Brush and Razor Stand With DE Blades - Classic Vintage Set Makes Great Gift
feature_bullets: ✅STURDY SAFETY RAZOR: A Twist-to-Open (Butterfly Open) design for easy blade replacement. Textured handle makes a great grip for wet hands. Comes with Free 10 double edge razor blades!
✅CHROME SHAVING BRUSH: Pure badger brush 21mm chrome handle is designed perfectly for your hands. Creates a rich lather while retaining water to the face. Great for your wet shaving needs.

✅DURABLE: Stronger than ceramic this chrome shaving bowl has a mirror-like image. 3 oz Ocean Driftwood shave soap included has a light, crisp scent. DRY & CLEAN TOOLS: Stainless steel brush and razor stand is designed to protect shaving tools, keeping them dry, clean and fresh.
✅DRY & CLEAN TOOLS: Stainless steel brush and razor stand is designed to protect shaving tools, keeping them dry, clean and fresh.
